Hello,

Thank you for completing a pension transfer enquiry form when visiting our FinSec PTX website.

Pease find attached the Letters of Authority your UK scheme's will require to provide us with the information necessary for us to prepare an accurate pension transfer report for you.

Please print, sign and either email or post the letters to us as follows:

Email: ptx@finsecpartners.com.au

Post: FinSec PTX, PO Box 1096, UNLEY, SA, 5061

Please let us know if you have any further questions.

If we require any further information we will contact you in the next few days.

Regards,

The PTX team at FinSec
